product_name: Darn Tough Run No-Show Tab Socks - Men's
long_description: Featuring light cushioning, seamless construction and a sleek, snug fit, the men's Run No-Show Tab socks from Darn Tough deliver lasting comfort whether you're headed out for 5 miles or 15. Merino wool/nylon/spandex fabric blend is soft and breathable while providing the perfect amount of cushioning and stretch. Merino wool proides light insulation and continues to insulate even when damp; merino wool is also naturally odor-resistant. Darn Tough Run No-Show Tab socks feature a streamlined fit and seamless construction to reduce blisters and chafing.
short_description: Featuring light cushioning, seamless construction and a sleek, snug fit, the men's Run No-Show Tab socks from Darn Tough deliver lasting comfort whether you're headed out for 5 miles or 15.
